message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with computer vision and graphics, specifically with the problem of recovering detailed 3D models of clothing from a single image. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves geometric and physical modeling, which suggests that it could be relevant to cs.GR (Computer Graphics). Additionally, the paper mentions virtual try-on and cloth animation, which could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the use of statistical and machine learning techniques suggests that cs.LG (Machine Learning) could also be a relevant category.
